text: The COVID-19 vaccine is recommended for all individuals aged 6 months and older.
Flu vaccines are updated annually to match the most common circulating strains.
Common side effects of vaccines include mild fever, fatigue, and soreness at the injection site.
People with severe allergic reactions to vaccine ingredients should consult their healthcare provider before vaccination.
The MMR vaccine protects against measles, mumps, and rubella, and is typically given in two doses.
Vaccination not only protects the individual but also contributes to community immunity.
